snippet.title: Moe Reversi Play Movie
snippet.description:
PC専用ゲームソフト「Moe Reversi」

販売サイト／Sales site
◆DLsite（JPN）
https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ246318.html
◆DLsite（ENG）
https://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE246318.html
◆FANZA
https://www.dmm.co.jp/dc/doujin/-/detail/=/cid=d_149507/?i3_ref=search&i3_ord=1
◆Booth
https://booth.pm/ja/items/1226504
◆itch.io 
https://icharax.itch.io/moe-reversi

総勢8人の美女達とリバーシで対決！
対戦相手はどの娘も可愛い女子ばかり。
8人の中から好みの対戦相手を選びリバーシで対決し、勝つと女子の着ている服が破壊され、あられもない姿に！
連続で3回勝つと健全男子大興奮なご褒美イラストをゲットできるぞ！　

Play against total 8 beautiful women in reversi! All opponents are really cute.
You will choose your favorite opponent from 8 opponents, play against it in reversi. If you win, the clothes they wear will be destroyed and they will be embarrassing appearance.
 If you win in three time straight, you will be able to get a reward illustration that makes healthy men excited.
